snippet: Nora Chipaumire’s latest dance work, “Miriam,” inspired by the South African singer and activist Miriam Makeba, will have its New York premiere at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
abstract: Choreographer Nora Chipaumire's latest dance work Miriam, which was partially inspired by the death of South African singer and activist Miriam Makeba, will have its New York premiere at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: Nora Chipaumire’s latest dance work, “Miriam,” inspired by the South African singer and activist Miriam Makeba, will have its New York premiere at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.

headline.seo: Nora Chipaumire’s Dance About Miriam Makeba Comes to BAM
headline.main: Bearing Burdens of the Ages, In Darkness and in Light
headline.print_headline: Bearing Burdens of the Ages, In Darkness and in Light
